timeline.bodyText:
Maybe we should use the NOTE instead?
NOTE: First of all, make sure the `quarkus-vertx` extension is present. If not, activate the extension by executing the following command: ...

But otherwise +1.
timeline.author: mkouba

 The previous example uses a _service_ provided by Quarkus.
 Also, you can use Vert.x clients directly.
+
